item.title: The Joy of Pets
item.description: Three weeks ago, I received a diagnosis of brain and lung cancer, which was a rather interesting situation to run into. I’ve since had brain surgery to remove two tumors from my skull and am the recovery path at home. I additionally have lung cancer treatment to deal with, which is creating some interesting times in our house. One of the things that has troubled me the most is that I’m currently suffering from a speech impediment.
